ci_column = np.array([[12.0], [10.0], [10.0]])
column_mask = np.array([[False], [False], [False]])
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=10.0, regions=[(0, 2,
    0, 1)], row_slope=0.0)
mean_of_columns = pattern.mean_charge_in_all_image_columns(column=ci_column,
    column_mask=column_mask)
assert mean_of_columns == [11.0]
